description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Worldwide locations, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Pre-Service Training

description.narrative: All costs incurred for pre-Service training of volunteers in Worldwide locations during their service, including language tutoring, workshops, and conferences.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Pre-Service Training - Administrative

description.narrative: All costs incurred for pre-Service training of volunteers in Worldwide locations directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
